[遂]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ljuds ): semantic 辵 + phonetic 㒸 ( suì ) . The original version is 㒸 , which has no reference to pigs (the pig is a phonetic component).

[逐]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 辵 ( “ walking ” ) + 豕 ( “ pig ” ) – "to chase; pursue".

[緝]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *sʰib ): semantic 糸 ( “ silk ” ) + phonetic 咠 ( OC *ʔsib, *sʰib ) .

[缉]
Simplified from 緝 ( 糹 → 纟 )
